title: Am I cursed or does mid/top die to fb and end up feeding every game. hm

embed.description: HÃ rV / Gold 2 0LP / 160W 154L Win Ratio 51% / Lucian - 31W 26L Win Ratio 54%, Draven - 12W 14L Win Ratio 46%, Azir - 6W 7L Win Ratio 46%, Jarvan IV - 6W 7L Win Ratio 46%, Mordekaiser - 8W 4L Win Ratio 67%

replies.body:
I see posts like these often, more towards the end of the season.
I feel a point that doesn't get highlighted often though is the amount of boosters and smurfs around this time.
Your teammates may just be up against a diamond/master smurf (off course this isn't the case most of the time) and just getting stomped because the enemy is good, not because they are a feeder, playing bad, or anything like that.

In league most people are sitting on between 40-60% WR, meaning its normal to lose half of your games and when the one or two extra losses, caused by boosters and smurfs, get stacked on top of the non-smurf losses, it gets rough real quick. 

A tactic boosters like to do is duoing with another booster and getting 2 orders completed at the same time, so if anything I would avoid duo q and just hope you get them on your team when you do happen to encounter them/

No honestly, the matchmaking is so complicated, but in a nutshell your queuing up with people who dont play the game for a while and play for some what reason. The matchmaking needs to improve because I'm teamed up with fake elo players who literally have no idea how to play the game.

Losing so much LP because of players and tilt within these players, **it is called elo hell something riot dosent care about.**

Yeah, this game makes you loopy.

I was convinced Riot were punishing me somehow for being toxic because every member of my teams were going sub-1.0 KDA for about a week.
